name: immutable-jsonld
description: Immutable JSON-LD data structures and utility functions

scripts.build: npm -s run lint && npm -s run transpile
scripts.transpile-tests: npm -s run build && babel test -d lib/test
scripts.test: npm -s run transpile-tests && tape lib/test/*.js | tap-spec

author: Ryan Shaw <ryanshaw@unc.edu>
